name: Tableau Charts UI Kit for Figma | Demo Version
description:
👉 Designforbi.com

or

👉 Gumroad

Please visit our website or Gumroad for Full Version


Do not forget to check also our video on Youtube.


Tableau Charts UI Kit helps Tableau users to design rapid prototypes for their clients. In the kit, you can find ready-to-use charts that you can drag and drop by having the design style of Tableau.



Show your client a high-fidelity prototype that has the look and feel of Tableau. You can also find also ready-to-go dashboard layouts for more inspiration.


Highlights

✅ 80+ pre-made blocks

✅ 100+ components

✅ Same look and feel as on Tableau

✅ Easy drag and drop of all charts and dashboard elements

✅ 10+ ready-to-go dashboard layouts

✅ Continuous updates with new charts, elements and dashboard layouts for more inspiration


One-off payment

⛔ No memberships

♾️ Download it and use it forever

🆓 Get free updates with new charts and elements for six months


You are not alone! 🤲🏼

We have created a quick start guide on how to get started with the UI Kit.
